name: Chain Collapse
description:
After the opponent's active character receives Hydro DMG or Dendro DMG: DMG +2.
Usage(s): 1
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the opponent's active character receives $[K102] or $[K107]:</color> DMG +2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the opponent's active character receives {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> or {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>:</color> DMG +2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color>
